name: Channel Auto forward bot
description: Telegram auto forwarding bot. Create your Fork now.

ADMINS.description: A space separated list of user_ids of Admins, they can only create links

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string. Get this from @BotFather

DB_URI.description: MongoDB URI. Get this value from MongoDB.

DB_NAME.description: Name of the database in MongoDB.
